availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard W. Pickering (Caldwell co., ky, constable )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, constable. Kentucky native. Married to Julia Ann Scott Pickering in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on June 6, 1848. Father of Zachariah Taylor Pickering, Louisa Pickering, and Nancy Pickering. Filed a marriage bond to Elizabeth A. Cook Pickering in Caldwell County on March 1, 1864. Stepfather of Colonel Hooper. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Constable in Long Pond in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 269.
